data.title: King Vittorio Amedeo II (of Sardinia)
data.text:
Children

King Carlo Emanuele IV Ferdinando Mario (of Sardinia) 3 b. 24 May 1751, d. 6 Oct 1819

Princess Maria Carlota (of Sardinia) 1 b. 16 Jul 1752, d. 17 Apr 1753

Queen Luigia (Maria Giuseppiina) (of France) 5 b. 2 Sep 1753, d. 13 Nov 1810

Prince Amedeo Alessandro Mario (of Sardinia) 1 b. 5 Oct 1754, d. 29 Apr 1755

Princess Maria Teresa (of Sardinia)+ 5 b. 31 Jan 1756, d. 2 Jun 1805

Princess Maria Anna Carolina Gabriella (of Sardinia) 1 b. 17 Dec 1757, d. 11 Oct 1824

King Vittorio Emanuele I (of Sardinia)+ 1 b. 24 Jul 1759, d. 10 Jan 1824

Princess Maria Giuseppina (of Sardinia) 1 b. 21 Nov 1760, d. 19 May 1768

Prince Maurizio Giuseppe (of Sardinia) 1 b. 13 Sep 1762, d. 2 Sep 1799

Princess Maria Carolina Antonia (of Sardinia) 1 b. 17 Jan 1764, d. 28 Dec 1782

King Carlo Felice Guiseppe Mario (of Sardinia) 1 b. 6 Apr 1765, d. 27 Apr 1831

Prince Giuseppe Placido (of Sardinia) 1 b. 5 Oct 1766, d. 29 Oct 1802
